Welcome to Data Visualization in R! We'll be using a dataset from the Pew Research Center's [Forum on Religion & Public Life](http://www.pewforum.org/), which is a country-wide survey from 2014 Americans' religious beliefs. You can download that data here: 

[http://www.pewforum.org/datasets/](http://www.pewforum.org/datasets/)
